    • launchGUI

      public void launchGUI() throws Exception
      Launches the GUI by creating a new thread and running a GUIRunnable object. The GUIRunnable is responsible for initializing and displaying the graphical user interface.
      Throws:
      Exception - if an exception occurs during the execution.
